name: Soft cookie
description:
"Soft Cookie" is a competitive game to determine who is the fastest to make cream in an almost empty cream can. In room is four stakeholder, they are worth around the table and quickly wave their hand, to cream huddled in a can of pepper spray. Who will make the latest cream, he will eat the liver with whipped cream from opponents. To quickly fill the scale-you need to drive the mouse up and down.

Key features:
- Nice 3D design.
- Rare genre. Very few similar games.
- 4 random locations.
- High-quality sound.
